name: Clan Wars
description:
FREE TO PLAY 3D VIKING MOBA


CLAN WARS is in it's alpha stage, it is created by a single developer and will be worked on continuously as long as there is a community to fuel ideas, help locate bugs, and suggest improvements.

  • Fast Paced 3v3 Bloody PVP Viking Battles
  • Stat saving feature
  • Earn Gold and Shop to buy items/equipment
  • Earn Progression Rewards/Rank Up
  • Clan Creation + Clan War Feature Coming Soon
